title: Token Distribution
description: Check the token distribution mechanisms.
whitepaper: Based on the provided context, the distribution mechanism for the tokens involves the creation (minting) and redemption (burning) by a centralized entity, Tether Limited. Users purchase tethers from exchanges such as Bitfinex, and Tether Limited is the only party that can issue or destroy tethers. The lifecycle of a tether begins with a user depositing fiat currency into Tether Limited's bank account. There is no mention of other distribution methods such as airdrops, rewards, staking, claims, dividends, faucets, bounties, vesting, liquidity mining, farming/yield farming, treasury/fund allocation, payment for services/work, lottery/raffle, or referral programs in the provided context. Therefore, the conclusion is that the tokens are distributed via purchase (sale) from exchanges, and the centralized issuance and redemption by Tether Limited.
code:
Based on the provided context, the distribution mechanism for the tokens involves the creation (minting) and redemption (burning) by a centralized entity, Tether Limited. Users purchase tethers by depositing fiat currency into Tether Limited's bank account, which suggests a sale/purchase distribution mechanism. There is no mention of other distribution methods such as airdrops, rewards, staking, claims, dividends, faucets, bounties, vesting, liquidity mining, farming/yield farming, treasury/fund allocation, payment for services/work, lottery/raffle, or referral programs in the given context.

Conclusion: The tokens are distributed through a centralized sale/purchase mechanism where Tether Limited mints new tokens upon receiving fiat deposits and burns tokens when they are redeemed.
